socketioServer module¶

Socketio server for Master Pi (MP). Client Agent Pi’s (AP) will connect to this server. We register different events here.

socketioServer.handle_carupdatelocation(message)¶

Update car location status.

Parameters

message (str) – id and status of car whose location needs updating.

socketioServer.handle_carupdatestatus(message)¶

Update car status.

Parameters

message (str) – id and status of car.

socketioServer.handle_facerec(message)¶

Handles user authentication via face recognition.

Parameters

message (str) – username for faceauth.

Returns

(str: Success/Fail, str: usrname, list: cars)

Return type

tuple

socketioServer.handle_usercred(message)¶

Handles user authentication for command line interface mode.

Parameters

message (str) – Message from AP containing username and password.

Returns

(str: Success/Fail, str: username, list: cars)

Return type

tuple
